description: Looking for a meat-free alternative for dinner? Load up your sweet potatoes with a mixture of chickpeas, onion, garlic, cumin, parsley and cheese; bake for 15 minutes; and serve with Greek-style yoghurt for a satisfying meal.
name: Chickpea-stuffed Sweet Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Grease and line a baking tray with baking paper.

Pierce the potato several times with a fork. Microwave on high for 8 minutes. Remove from the microwave. Cool slightly. Cut in half. Using a teaspoon, scoop out flesh to leave a 2cm-thick shell. Place potato in a large bowl. Mash slightly. Stir in chickpeas, half the onion, half the garlic, cumin, half the parsley and half the cheese. Season.

Place potato shells on prepared tray. Fill with chickpea mixture. Top with remaining cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden brown. 2cm-thick shell. Place potato in a large bowl. Mash slightly. Stir in chickpeas, half the onion, half the garlic, cumin, half the parsley and half the cheese. Season
Combine yoghurt with remaining onion and remaining garlic in a bowl. Serve stuffed potato with yoghurt.
